metadata.title: CVE-2014-7829 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability inactionpack/lib/action_dispatch/middleware/static.rb in Action Pack in Rubyon Rails 3.x before 3.2.21, 4.0.x before 4.0.12, 4.1.x before 4.1.8, and4.2.x before 4.2.0.beta4, when serve_static_assets is enabled, allowsremote attackers to determine the existence of files outside theapplication root via vectors involving a \ (backslash) character, a similarissue to CVE-2014-7818.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
